intro.title: Dolphin
intro.subtitle: blockchain intelligence
intro.description: an open-source platform for collaborative crypto-asset investment analysis

about.title: What is it?
about.description: The platform enables participants (investors, authors and experts) to establish efficient collaboration in order to enhance ICO investment analysis. The platform includes widgets and corresponding data providers, which can be developed by independent authors and plugged into the platform. The platform combines advantages of automatic analysis (machine learning) and expert analysis approaches. The platform is designed as a distributed application (DApp). A set of auditable smart-contracts is used to calculate reputation of experts and voting influence of investors and to distribute monthly revenue received from investors to authors and experts according to their contribution. All contracts have a transparent and community-controlled update policy.

items.title: Enhanced Analysis Speed
items.description: The platform combines speed of machine learning algorithms with versatility and depth of expert evaluation to provide you with tools for a swifter and more flexible decision-making process

items.title: Collaboration
items.description: The platform enables collaboration and knowledge sharing between participants, allowing for opinion variety and broadening the scope of analysis

items.title: Expert rating system
items.description: A transparent and attack-proof rating system allows the experts to make a profit out of their contributions

items.title: Smart Contract Core
items.description: The rating system, revenue distribution and access to widgets are handled by a set of smart contracts, which provide objectivity and transparency

items.title: Community-driven development
items.description: All update propositions are voted on by the community and the platform evolves according to needs of users

items.title: Custom widgets
items.description: Independent authors can create their own widgets and deploy them on the platform, enriching it with new features and simultaneously making profit

screenshots.title: Dashboards and widgets
screenshots.subtitle: Investors receive powerful tools packed into widgets to support analysis of crypto-assets in every stage (presale, ICO, post-ICO)

stages.title: Presale
goals: receive feedback from early backers on what is clear and attractive or unclear and repelling to update project vision
attract angel investors with whom the project can be discussed in detail
verify whether the investors require a solution for the defined problem
develop an MVP and optimize it according to received feedback

stages.title: MVP release
goals: In-house development, number of features depends on the amount gathered at the presale stage: at least 2 automatic (machine learning) and 2 manual (expert) widgets

stages.title: ICO finishes
goals: launch full-scale development of the final product

stages.title: Production release v1
goals: first public release of the in-house developed platform
most widgets and data providers are created by the core team

stages.title: Production release v2
goals: publish the official guidelines for development of widgets and data providers and their deployment through the API
